channel.title: Wait Times on
channel.description: Recent content in Wait Times on

item.title: How much is too long a wait? Calculating expected wait times of wood deliveries
item.description: Logging trucks wait to be weighed before dropping off their loads of wood. (Photo: Jamey Malcomb/Pine Journal) How important are wait times for loggers and truckers? Wood procurement managers and suppliers are both interested in reducing the wait times (or turn times) of wood deliveries. Wait times are defined as the time required for trucks to scale in and out when wood is delivered to a mill. Both wood procurement managers and their suppliers need to know when wait times exceed the amount of time they expect.
